stance_1: I choose meat based on cost
stance_2: My meat choices are influenced by family preferences
justification: The interviewee states that both cost and family preferences jointly motivate their meat choices, showing these factors reinforce each other.

stance_1: I eat beef and fish regularly
stance_2: I eat meat five times per week
justification: The interviewee directly states that their frequent weekly meat consumption consists mainly of beef and fish.

stance_1: I eat meat five times per week
stance_2: I eat meat to feel fuller and better
justification: The interviewee states that meat consumption helps them feel fuller and better, supporting frequent consumption.

stance_1: I eat meat to feel fuller and better
